Comments_List:
A more systematic approach to making complicated ethical decisions
An understanding of just how tough these decisions can be

Strengths: The course provided us with wide and deep perspectives necessary to make a decision as a leader in a complex situation. The tools of analysis the professor and TA gave us were highly useful in a general context. They were so supportive that I never had any trouble in the course. 
Weaknesses: Nothing
Definitely take this course if you're seeking to understand your own ethical framework and how it relates to decision making!!
